name: Astros: Space Savior
description:
Modifications: 

-I added three different distinct levels with a boss that you must escape from in Level 3...the boss is PACMAN  ⍩⃝ 

-I also added a gravity switching mechanic (Press G to switch the gravity)!

-Animation in main menu screen!

-PACMAN animation!

-Epic music of the Evil PACMAN has also been added!

-the Level design of each level is unique!

Created by Omar Alkaley - OZ official game studio 

Music in Level3 is from Zapsplat.com
